_header: Thus said Mary of great honor
_description: James Ryman, a hymn on the Magnificat — eight quatrains (abab) and burden (cc): ‘Vnto marie he that loue hath / To here synge he Magnificat’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Thus seide mary of grete honourMy soule my lord dothe
                    magnifie…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…That was & is & ay shall beBothe iij & one of
                    myghtes moost
